column1: Donald Powley rides herd on the splash and the drip in his new works at Rubinstein / Diacono ( 13 March until 10 April ) while Charles Cowles features new work by two veteran abstractionists, Tom Holland and Charles Arnoldi, from 6 March until the end of the month.
